change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Coronica del rey dõ Enrríque el quarto de Castilla y de León circa 1470-1475
did.abstract: Holographic volume that chronicles the life and achievements of King Henry IV of Castile and León. Enríque del Castillo wrote it in 167 titled chapters, and concluded "Finis, Laus Deo."

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Coronica del rey dõ Enrríque el quarto de Castilla y de León (MS 079). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: From the preface: the Licenciado Diego Enríque del Castillo was chronicler, chaplain, and royal advisor.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holographic volume that chronicles the life and achievements of King Henry IV of Castile and León. Enríque del Castillo wrote it in 167 titled chapters, and concluded "Finis, Laus Deo."

relatedmaterial.p: Later published, in 1787, by Impr. de A. de Sancha, Madrid.

controlaccess.persname: Henry IV, King of Castile and Leon, 1425-1474.
